channel.title: proftpd on wd and cc
channel.description: Recent content in proftpd on wd and cc

item.title: proftpd 配置
item.description: www.proftpd.org ServerName "Caph ftp server..." ServerType standalone DefaultServer on Port 21 Umask 002 MaxInstances 30 User ftp Group ftp DisplayLogin .welcome.msg DeferWelcome on ServerIdent Off UseReverseDNS off IdentLookups off MaxLoginAttempts 3 MaxClientsPerHost 2 MaxClients 20 MaxInstances 100 ListOptions "" DirFakeUser On ftp DirFakeGroup On ftp DeferWelcome On LogFormat awstats "%t
